name: Last Call (Ico)
description:
"Some problems are drowned at the bottom of the glass. Others never leave you."

In this surreal psychological horror adventure inspired by the films of David Lynch, the early Silent Hill games‭, and RPG Maker classics like Corpse Party - make your way through the ever-twisting floors of an upscale apartment complex‭, ‬solving puzzles and trying to make sense of the surreal sights driven by your drunken state‭.

After all‭, ‬your visions are not a question of real or not‭, ‬but why this is happening at all‭.‬

Created by a two-person team of writer/director Ico and artist Kerry Crowe, experience the start of Last Call in our First Look Demo - a 15-30 minute look into the game's intended tone and gameplay.
